summary: This is my first mod, it's a beautiful mansion-like player home. It contains all crafting stations, kitchen, dining room, children's room, steward/housecarl's room and a master bedroom for the dragonborn and their spouse!
descriptionHtml:
-UPDATE; New version of house with 2 more beds for children and a room (next to the stewards) for a couple of followers.
[b]--- I have fixed various holes in the walls and the blockage to the kitchen- please download the lastest file again! I'm so sorry for all of these bugs but most of them should be out of the way now, there is a missing texture that my friend is helping me look into. [/b]

Hi guys! Thank you for taking a look at and hopefully downloading and enjoying my first mod! 

This is a beautiful, mansion-like player home. I used the Blue Palace because I thought it was beautiful. I cut out a few things and put in some new things, this house includes a navmesh which means that anyone you bring to the home WILL enter and walk around freely. 

[b][size=3]Before I say anything else I would like to make sure you all understand that this mod does have some minimal requirements. [/size][u][size=5]This mod requires the Skyrim Update.esm and it requires the Hearthfire DLC[/size][/u][size=3]. [/size]

[size=3]WitchRiser also made an amazing mod called 'Custom Family Home'. It allows you to move your entire family (children, spouse, steward and even your bard) to a new home via casting a spell. If you would like to use this for my home or any other custom home for that matter please download it here! http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47621/?[/size][/b]

Palace Residence contains a beautiful master bedroom for the dragonborn and their spouse, this room also has an onsuite bathroom. Down the hall is the children's room which has 2 beds and 2 chests for those little cuties to use. In the middle of the house we have a beautiful dining room for you and your family.  This is on the 'left wing' of the house. On the right wing of the house you have a room for your Steward/housecarl and a kitchen that contains some harvestable meat and herbs! This house has a basement, what's in the basement? Why- a daedric worshipper's drea- [b]I'm just kidding! [/b] It contains every crafting station you need as well as [b]LOTS OF STORAGE.[/b] I have lots of pictures for you to see as well! 

If you love the mod please let me know and please endorse! I will make more mods- I'm still learning. It took 2 weeks to finish this house and I'm so excited to release it and to show you all the photos of the house too!
author: Rachel Turner
